description: Witness the nature at its fluffiest as you walk the thick sheet of snow, endure the piercing wind, and contain the elusive at one of the best places to visit in January in India with family.
Also known as the skiing destination of India, Auli wears almost all shades of nature to become one of the favorite tourist places in India in January.
Nothing beats the charm of Delhi in the month of January. Beautiful people, vibrant festivals, and one national carnival.
The capital city of Rajasthan evokes an aura of nonchalant charm and imperial regalia, something that the royal state has thrived on since ages.
Comprising the upper half of the westernmost state of India, Kutch is another exciting place to visit in India in January.
Once a pacifying retreat for the Portuguese, Diu remains a major source of attraction for tourists who look forward to a soothing retreat far away from the madding crowd.
India’s most celebrated holiday destination and the fulcrum of bachelors’ most awaited tour plan is at its prime in winter.
How does the idea of floating frivolously on the calm backwaters of Kerala sound like? Exciting ya! There’s more to it.
January is the time when Tamil Nadu is at its best. The place exhibits a myriad of colors offered by nature.
This out-of-the-world place by far remains one of the best places to visit in January for couples.
Holding the prestigious distinction of being home to the Mecca of India, Hyderabad turns into an allure for travelers.
The nonchalant charm of this relatively quiet sojourn makes it an ideal holiday destination in India in January.
Popular worldwide for the Jagannath temple. Chilka lake is a popular tourist attraction for nature enthusiasts and sees a large number of footfalls especially in the month of January.
Kolkata holds the distinction of being another top-notch place to visit in India in January.
100 km to the south of Guwahati lies Shillong- the capital city of Meghalaya, nurtured and groomed by the rain Gods.
This is one of the most picturesque places to visit in India during January. Mawsynram is a refreshingly beautiful village in the Shillong city of Meghalaya.
This is one of the warm places to visit in January in India. Located in the Thar Desert, Jaisalmer is a historical trading center in Rajasthan.
Pondicherry or Puducherry, a charming Union Territory is one of the most beautiful places to visit in winter in India.
Nainital in Uttarakhand is amongst the best tourist places in India in January that is famous for its romantic vibes and plenty of places to visit that you can roam around.
When looking for places to go in January in India, Khajuraho is an ideal choice of destination.
Take a tour of the quaint Himalayan Mountain peaks like Kanchenjunga and beautiful Buddhist monasteries like Ghum Monastery in Darjeeling.
Gulmarg transforms into a winter wonderland during winter. If you’re looking for places to go in January in India,
Experience the thrill of seeking out an adventure trail in the absolute wilderness in the dense jungles of Uttarakhand at Jim Corbett National Park.
Chikmagalur is one of the most famous hill stations in Karnataka, known as the little piece of heaven it attracts thousands of tourists all year-round.
